name: "Up" and "Down" Movies Multiple Choice Quiz | Something in Common | 10 Questions

questions.text: In what movie would you find Roy Scheider starring as NYC Police Officer Buddy Manucci?
questions.explanation:
The Seven-Ups.

	Scheider played Officer Manucci running a task force charged with taking down criminals guilty of offenses that would get them a minimum of seven years in prison upon conviction.

questions.text: What 1967 movie was about the trials and tribulations of a new teacher?
questions.explanation:
Up the Down Staircase.

	This drama starred Sandy Dennis as a new teacher in the NYC Public School system trying to make a difference in her students' lives.

questions.text: In which movie did Warren Beatty appear with Karl Malden and Eva-Marie Saint?
questions.explanation:
All Fall Down.

	This 1962 drama also starred Karl Malden and Angela Lansbury as Warren Beatty's parents.

questions.text: Who provided the voice of Bernard and Miss Bianca in "The Rescuers Down Under"?
options: Merv Griffin and Zsa Zsa Gabor
Mel Gibson and Olivia Newton John
questions.explanation:
Bob Newhart and Eva Gabor.

	Bernard and Miss Bianca return as the mouse squad from the International Rescue Society first seen in the 1977  movie "The Rescuers". George C. Scott provided the voice of the evil poacher Mcleach in this 1990 Disney movie.

questions.text: What 1997 movie starred Russell Crowe and Selma Hayek as lovers?
options: Breaking Up is Hard to Do
questions.explanation:
Breaking Up.

	This 1997 comedy/drama was filmed in 1995 but didn't emerge until 1997 as a limited release.

questions.text: What 1969 movie was about a family living under water?
questions.explanation:
Hello Down There.

	This family comedy starred Tony Randall as Fred Miller and Janet Leigh as his wife Vivian. Also co-starring are Merv Griffin (who portrays himself), Richard Dreyfuss and Roddy McDowell (as rock musicians).

questions.text: What movie starred Molly Ringwald as museum guide and Robert Downey Jr as a school teacher?
questions.explanation:
The Pick-Up Artist.

	This 1987 comedy/romance movie also co-starred Dennis Hopper, Danny Aiello and Harvey Keitel.

questions.text: This comedy starred Walter Matthau as an alcholic ex-writer and his family.
questions.explanation:
Hanging Up.

	Diane Keaton, Meg Ryan and Lisa Kudrow played Matthau's daughters in this comedy released in 2000. Alan Arkin, Cloris Leachman and Mary Steenburgen also co-starred.

questions.text: What 1990 movie starred Tom Selleck as an American cowboy in Australia?
questions.explanation:
Quigley Down Under.

	Tom Selleck starred as Matthew Quigley, an American cowboy answering an advertisement placed by cattle baron Elliot Marston (played by Alan Rickman).

questions.text: What 1995 movie was based in a town called Ffynnon Garw?
questions.correct: The Englishman Who Went up a Hill But Came Down a Mountain
options: The Englishman Who Went Down a Mountain But Came Up a Hill
questions.explanation:
The Englishman Who Went up a Hill But Came Down a Mountain.

	The movie starred Hugh Grant as a British cartographer assigned to survey this small Welsh town.
